name: Real Moto Race Free – Get the PRO version of motorcycle game as the race is on.
name_original: Real Moto Race Free – Get the PRO version of motorcycle game as the race is on.
description:
The Moto Bike Race Madness has hit full throttle, so now is the time to take the ride to town, riding your favorite moto bike and see how long you can go in this endless runner adventure. Drive in full throttle and never look back!

Driving reaches the heights of madness, as you attempt to cross the desert landmark on your moto bike. Drive in full speed, avoiding the various obstacles and difficulties the desert has to offer. Strafe by using the gyroscopic movements by tilting the device. Pass through the rings to collect them and boost your distance score. Let’s see how far you can hit it!

Moto Bike Race Madness is free to download and play. Download Now!

Features
- Fun endless moto bike driving madness
- Collect rings to boost scores
- Fun filled rides with lots of obstacles and tricks
